verses.text: Adam, Seth, Enosh, Cainan, Mahalalel, Jared, Enoch, Methuselah, Lamech, Noah, the sons of Noah: Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
parts: Adam, Seth, Enosh,
Cainan, Mahalalel, Jared, Enoch, Methuselah, Lamech, Noah, the sons of Noah: Shem, Ham, and Japheth.

verses.text: The sons of Japheth were Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Meshech, and Tiras.
parts: The sons of Japheth were Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Meshech, and Tiras.

verses.text: The sons of Gomer were Ashkenaz, Diphath, and Togarmah.
parts: The sons of Gomer were Ashkenaz, Diphath, and Togarmah.

verses.text: The sons of Javan were Elishah, Tarshishah, Kittim, and Rodanim.
parts: The sons of Javan were Elishah, Tarshishah, Kittim, and Rodanim.

verses.text: The sons of Ham were Cush, Mizraim, Put, and Canaan.
parts: The sons of Ham were Cush, Mizraim, Put, and Canaan.

verses.text: The sons of Cush were Seba, Havilah, Sabta, Raama, and Sabtecha.
parts: The sons of Cush were Seba, Havilah, Sabta, Raama, and Sabtecha.

verses.text: Cush begot Nimrod; he began to be a mighty hunter on the earth.
parts: Cush begot Nimrod; he began to be a mighty hunter on the earth.

verses.text: The sons of Shem were Elam, Asshur, and Arphaxad.
parts: The sons of Shem were Elam, Asshur, and Arphaxad.

verses.text: Shela,
parts: Shela,

verses.text: Eber, Pheleg, Ragan,
parts: Eber, Pheleg, Ragan,

verses.text: Seruch, Nachor, Tharrha,
parts: Seruch, Nachor, Tharrha,

verses.text: Abraham.
parts: Abraham.

verses.text: And the sons of Abraham: Isaac and Ishmael.
parts: And the sons of Abraham: Isaac and Ishmael.

verses.text: And these are their generations: the firstborn of Ishmael, Nabaeoth, and Kedar, Nabdeel, Massam,
parts: And these are their generations: the firstborn of Ishmael, Nabaeoth, and Kedar, Nabdeel, Massam,

verses.text: Masma, Iduma, Masse, Chondan, Thaeman,
parts: Masma, Iduma, Masse, Chondan, Thaeman,

verses.text: Jettur, Naphes, Kedma: these the sons of Ishmael.
parts: Jettur, Naphes, Kedma: these the sons of Ishmael.

verses.text: And the sons of Keturah, Abraham's concubine: she bore him Zembram, Jexan, Madiam, Madam, Sobac, Soe; and the sons of Jexan: Daedan and Sabai;
parts: And the sons of Keturah, Abraham's concubine: she bore him Zembram, Jexan, Madiam, Madam, Sobac, Soe; and the sons of Jexan: Daedan and Sabai;

verses.text: and the sons of Madiam: Gephar, and Opher, and Enoch, and Abida, and Eldada; all these the sons of Keturah.
parts: and the sons of Madiam: Gephar, and Opher, and Enoch, and Abida, and Eldada; all these the sons of Keturah.

verses.text: And Abraham begot Isaac: and the sons of Isaac were Jacob and Esau.
parts: And Abraham begot Isaac: and the sons of Isaac were Jacob and Esau.

verses.text: The sons of Esau: Eliphaz, and Raguel, and Jeul, and Jeglom, and Core.
parts: The sons of Esau: Eliphaz, and Raguel, and Jeul, and Jeglom, and Core.

verses.text: The sons of Eliphaz: Thaeman, and Omar, Sophar, and Gootham, and Kenez, and Thamna, and Amalek.
parts: The sons of Eliphaz: Thaeman, and Omar, Sophar, and Gootham, and Kenez, and Thamna, and Amalek.

verses.text: And the sons of Raguel, Naches, Zare, Some, and Moze.
parts: And the sons of Raguel, Naches, Zare, Some, and Moze.

verses.text: The sons of Seir: Lotan, Sobal, Sebegon, Ana, Deson, Osar, and Disan.
parts: The sons of Seir: Lotan, Sobal, Sebegon, Ana, Deson, Osar, and Disan.

verses.text: And the sons of Lotan: Chorri and Aeman; and the sister of Lotan was Thamna.
parts: And the sons of Lotan: Chorri and Aeman; and the sister of Lotan was Thamna.

verses.text: The sons of Sobal: Alon, Machanath, Taebel, Sophi, and Onan; and the sons of Sebegon: Aeth and Sonan.
parts: The sons of Sobal: Alon, Machanath, Taebel, Sophi, and Onan; and the sons of Sebegon: Aeth and Sonan.

verses.text: The sons of Sonan, Daeson; and the sons of Daeson: Emeron, and Asebon, and Jethram, and Charran.
parts: The sons of Sonan, Daeson; and the sons of Daeson: Emeron, and Asebon, and Jethram, and Charran.

verses.text: And the sons of Hosar: Balaam, and Zucam, and Acan; the sons of Disan: Os and Aran.
parts: And the sons of Hosar: Balaam, and Zucam, and Acan; the sons of Disan: Os and Aran.

verses.text: And these are their kings: Bela the son of Beor, and the name of his city was Dinhabah.
parts: And these are their kings: Bela the son of Beor, and the name of his city was Dinhabah.

verses.text: When Bela died, Jobab the son of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in his place.
parts: When Bela died, Jobab the son of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in his place.

verses.text: When Jobab died, Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in his place.
parts: When Jobab died, Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in his place.

verses.text: And when Husham died, Hadad the son of Bedad, who attacked Midian in the field of Moab, reigned in his place.
parts: And when Husham died, Hadad the son of Bedad, who attacked Midian in the field of Moab, reigned in his place.

verses.text: When Hadad died, Samlah of Masrekah reigned in his place.
parts: When Hadad died, Samlah of Masrekah reigned in his place.

verses.text: And when Samlah died, Saul of Rehoboth by the river reigned in his place.
parts: And when Samlah died, Saul of Rehoboth by the river reigned in his place.

verses.text: When Saul died, Baal-Hanan the son of Achbor reigned in his place.
parts: When Saul died, Baal-Hanan the son of Achbor reigned in his place.

verses.text: And when Baal-Hanan the son of Achbor died, Hadad the son of Barad reigned in his place; and the name of his city was Phogor.
parts: And when Baal-Hanan the son of Achbor died, Hadad the son of Barad reigned in his place; and the name of his city was Phogor.

verses.text: Hadad died also.
parts: Hadad died also.

verses.text: Chief Aholibamah, Chief Elah, Chief Pinon,
parts: Chief Aholibamah, Chief Elah, Chief Pinon,

verses.text: Chief Kenaz, Chief Teman, Chief Mibzar,
parts: Chief Kenaz, Chief Teman, Chief Mibzar,

verses.text: Chief Magdiel, and Chief Iram.
parts: Chief Magdiel, and Chief Iram.

verses.text: These were the sons of Israel: Reuben, Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issachar, Zebulun, Dan, Joseph, Benjamin, Naphtali, Gad, and Asher.
parts: These were the sons of Israel: Reuben, Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issachar, Zebulun, Dan, Joseph, Benjamin, Naphtali, Gad, and Asher.

verses.text: The sons of Judah were Er, Onan, and Shelah.
parts: The sons of Judah were Er, Onan, and Shelah.

verses.text: And Tamar, his daughter-in-law, bore him Perez and Zerah.
parts: And Tamar, his daughter-in-law, bore him Perez and Zerah.

verses.text: The sons of Perez were Hezron and Hamul.
parts: The sons of Perez were Hezron and Hamul.

verses.text: The sons of Zerah were Zimri, Ethan, Heman, Calcol, and Dara, five of them in all.
parts: The sons of Zerah were Zimri, Ethan, Heman, Calcol, and Dara, five of them in all.

verses.text: The sons of Carmi: Achar, the troublemaker of Israel, who was nullified with a curse.
parts: The sons of Carmi: Achar, the troublemaker of Israel, who was nullified with a curse.

verses.text: The son of Ethan was Azariah.
parts: The son of Ethan was Azariah.

verses.text: Also the sons of Hezron who were born to him were Jerahmeel, Ram, and Chelubai.
parts: Also the sons of Hezron who were born to him were Jerahmeel, Ram, and Chelubai.

verses.text: Ram begot Amminadab, and Amminadab begot Nahshon, leader of the children of Judah;
parts: Ram begot Amminadab, and Amminadab begot Nahshon, leader of the children of Judah;

verses.text: Nahshon begot Salma, and Salma begot Boaz;
parts: Nahshon begot Salma, and Salma begot Boaz;

verses.text: Boaz begot Obed, and Obed begot Jesse;
parts: Boaz begot Obed, and Obed begot Jesse;

verses.text: Jesse begot Eliab his firstborn, Abinadab the second, Shimea the third,
parts: Jesse begot Eliab his firstborn, Abinadab the second, Shimea the third,

verses.text: Nethanel the fourth, Raddai the fifth,
parts: Nethanel the fourth, Raddai the fifth,

verses.text: Ozem the sixth, and David the seventh.
parts: Ozem the sixth, and David the seventh.

verses.text: Now their sisters were Zeruiah and Abigail.
parts: Now their sisters were Zeruiah and Abigail.

verses.text: Abigail bore Amasa; and the father of Amasa was Jether the Ishmaelite.
parts: Abigail bore Amasa; and the father of Amasa was Jether the Ishmaelite.

verses.text: Caleb the son of Hezron had children by Azubah, his wife, and by Jerioth.
parts: Caleb the son of Hezron had children by Azubah, his wife, and by Jerioth.

verses.text: When Azubah died, Caleb took Ephrath as his wife, who bore him Hur.
parts: When Azubah died, Caleb took Ephrath as his wife, who bore him Hur.

verses.text: And Hur begot Uri, and Uri begot Bezalel.
parts: And Hur begot Uri, and Uri begot Bezalel.

verses.text: Now afterward Hezron went in to the daughter of Machir, the father of Gilead, whom he married when he was sixty years old; and she bore him Segub.
parts: Now afterward Hezron went in to the daughter of Machir, the father of Gilead, whom he married when he was sixty years old; and she bore him Segub.

verses.text: Segub begot Jair, who had twenty-three cities in the land of Gilead.
parts: Segub begot Jair, who had twenty-three cities in the land of Gilead.

verses.text: Geshur and Syria took from them the towns of Jair, with Kenath and its towns, sixty towns.
parts: Geshur and Syria took from them the towns of Jair, with Kenath and its towns, sixty towns.

verses.text: After Hezron died in Caleb-Ephrathah, Hezron's wife Abijah bore him Ashhur the father of Tekoa.
parts: After Hezron died in Caleb-Ephrathah, Hezron's wife Abijah bore him Ashhur the father of Tekoa.

verses.text: The sons of Jerahmeel, the firstborn of Hezron, were Ram, the firstborn, and Bunah, Oren, Ozem, and Ahijah.
parts: The sons of Jerahmeel, the firstborn of Hezron, were Ram, the firstborn, and Bunah, Oren, Ozem, and Ahijah.

verses.text: Jerahmeel had another wife, whose name was Atarah; she was the mother of Onam.
parts: Jerahmeel had another wife, whose name was Atarah; she was the mother of Onam.

verses.text: The sons of Ram, the firstborn of Jerahmeel, were Maaz, Jamin, and Eker.
parts: The sons of Ram, the firstborn of Jerahmeel, were Maaz, Jamin, and Eker.

verses.text: The sons of Onam were Shammai and Jada.
parts: The sons of Onam were Shammai and Jada.

verses.text: And the name of the wife of Abishur was Abihail, and she bore him Ahban and Molid.
parts: And the name of the wife of Abishur was Abihail, and she bore him Ahban and Molid.

verses.text: The sons of Nadab were Seled and Appaim; Seled died without children.
parts: The sons of Nadab were Seled and Appaim; Seled died without children.

verses.text: The son of Appaim was Ishi, the son of Ishi was Sheshan, and Sheshan's son was Ahlai.
parts: The son of Appaim was Ishi, the son of Ishi was Sheshan, and Sheshan's son was Ahlai.

verses.text: The sons of Jada, the brother of Shammai, were Jether and Jonathan; Jether died without children.
parts: The sons of Jada, the brother of Shammai, were Jether and Jonathan; Jether died without children.

verses.text: The sons of Jonathan were Peleth and Zaza.
parts: The sons of Jonathan were Peleth and Zaza.

verses.text: Now Sheshan had no sons, only daughters.
parts: Now Sheshan had no sons, only daughters.

verses.text: Sheshan gave his daughter to Jarha his servant as wife, and she bore him Attai.
parts: Sheshan gave his daughter to Jarha his servant as wife, and she bore him Attai.

verses.text: Attai begot Nathan, and Nathan begot Zabad;
parts: Attai begot Nathan, and Nathan begot Zabad;

verses.text: Zabad begot Ephlal, and Ephlal begot Obed;
parts: Zabad begot Ephlal, and Ephlal begot Obed;

verses.text: Obed begot Jehu, and Jehu begot Azariah;
parts: Obed begot Jehu, and Jehu begot Azariah;

verses.text: Azariah begot Helez, and Helez begot Eleasah;
parts: Azariah begot Helez, and Helez begot Eleasah;

verses.text: Eleasah begot Sismai, and Sismai begot Shallum;
parts: Eleasah begot Sismai, and Sismai begot Shallum;

verses.text: Shallum begot Jekamiah, and Jekamiah begot Elishama.
parts: Shallum begot Jekamiah, and Jekamiah begot Elishama.

verses.text: The descendants of Caleb the brother of Jerahmeel were Mesha, his firstborn, who was the father of Ziph, and the sons of Mareshah the father of Hebron.
parts: The descendants of Caleb the brother of Jerahmeel were Mesha, his firstborn, who was the father of Ziph, and the sons of Mareshah the father of Hebron.

verses.text: The sons of Hebron were Korah, Tappuah, Rekem, and Shema.
parts: The sons of Hebron were Korah, Tappuah, Rekem, and Shema.

verses.text: Shema begot Raham the father of Jorkoam, and Rekem begot Shammai.
parts: Shema begot Raham the father of Jorkoam, and Rekem begot Shammai.

verses.text: And the son of Shammai was Maon, and Maon was the father of Beth Zur.
parts: And the son of Shammai was Maon, and Maon was the father of Beth Zur.

verses.text: Ephah, Caleb's concubine, bore Haran, Moza, and Gazez; and Haran begot Gazez.
parts: Ephah, Caleb's concubine, bore Haran, Moza, and Gazez; and Haran begot Gazez.

verses.text: The sons of Jahdai were Regem, Jotham, Geshan, Pelet, Ephah, and Shaaph.
parts: The sons of Jahdai were Regem, Jotham, Geshan, Pelet, Ephah, and Shaaph.

verses.text: Maachah, Caleb's concubine, bore Sheber and Tirhanah.
parts: Maachah, Caleb's concubine, bore Sheber and Tirhanah.

verses.text: She also bore Shaaph the father of Madmannah, Sheva the father of Machbenah and the father of Gibea.
parts: She also bore Shaaph the father of Madmannah, Sheva the father of Machbenah and the father of Gibea.

verses.text: These were the descendants of Caleb: The sons of Hur, the firstborn of Ephrathah, were Shobal the father of Kirjath Jearim,
parts: These were the descendants of Caleb: The sons of Hur, the firstborn of Ephrathah, were Shobal the father of Kirjath Jearim,

verses.text: Salma the father of Bethlehem, and Hareph the father of Beth Gader.
parts: Salma the father of Bethlehem, and Hareph the father of Beth Gader.

verses.text: And Shobal the father of Kirjath Jearim had descendants: Haroeh and half of the families of Manuhoth.
parts: And Shobal the father of Kirjath Jearim had descendants: Haroeh and half of the families of Manuhoth.

verses.text: The families of Kirjath Jearim were the Ithrites, the Puthites, the Shumathites, and the Mishraites.
parts: The families of Kirjath Jearim were the Ithrites, the Puthites, the Shumathites, and the Mishraites.

verses.text: The sons of Salma were Bethlehem, the Netophathites, Atroth-Beth-Joab, half of the Manahethites, and the Zorites.
parts: The sons of Salma were Bethlehem, the Netophathites, Atroth-Beth-Joab, half of the Manahethites, and the Zorites.

verses.text: And the families of the scribes who dwelt at Jabez were the Tirathites, the Shimeathites, and the Suchathites.
parts: And the families of the scribes who dwelt at Jabez were the Tirathites, the Shimeathites, and the Suchathites.

verses.text: Now these were the sons of David who were born to him in Hebron: The firstborn was Amnon, by Ahinoam the Jezreelitess; the second, Daniel, by Abigail the Carmelitess; the third, Absalom the son of Maacah, the daughter of Talmai, king of Geshur; the fourth, Adonijah the son of Haggith; the fifth, Shephatiah, by Abital; the sixth, Ithream, by his wife Eglah.
parts: Now these were the sons of David who were born to him in Hebron: The firstborn was Amnon, by Ahinoam the Jezreelitess; the second, Daniel, by Abigail the Carmelitess;
the third, Absalom the son of Maacah, the daughter of Talmai, king of Geshur; the fourth, Adonijah the son of Haggith; the fifth, Shephatiah, by Abital; the sixth, Ithream, by his wife Eglah.

verses.text: These six were born to him in Hebron.
parts: These six were born to him in Hebron.

verses.text: And these were born to him in Jerusalem: Shimea, Shobab, Nathan, and Solomon, four by Bathshua the daughter of Ammiel.
parts: And these were born to him in Jerusalem: Shimea, Shobab, Nathan, and Solomon, four by Bathshua the daughter of Ammiel.

verses.text: Also there were Ibhar, Elishama, Eliphelet,
parts: Also there were Ibhar, Elishama, Eliphelet,

verses.text: Nogah, Nepheg, Japhia,
parts: Nogah, Nepheg, Japhia,

verses.text: Elishama, Eliada, and Eliphelet, nine in all.
parts: Elishama, Eliada, and Eliphelet, nine in all.

verses.text: These were all the sons of David, besides the sons of the concubines, and Tamar their sister.
parts: These were all the sons of David, besides the sons of the concubines, and Tamar their sister.

verses.text: The sons of Solomon were Rehoboam; Abijah was his son, Asa his son, Jehoshaphat his son, Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son, Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son, Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son, Amon his son, and Josiah his son.
parts: The sons of Solomon were Rehoboam; Abijah was his son, Asa his son, Jehoshaphat his son,
Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son, Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son, Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son, Amon his son, and Josiah his son.

verses.text: Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son,
parts: Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son,

verses.text: Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son,
parts: Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son,

verses.text: Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son,
parts: Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son,

verses.text: Amon his son, and Josiah his son.
parts: Amon his son, and Josiah his son.

verses.text: The sons of Josiah were Johanan the firstborn, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, and the fourth Shallum.
parts: The sons of Josiah were Johanan the firstborn, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, and the fourth Shallum.

verses.text: The sons of Jehoiakim were Jeconiah his son and Zedekiah his son.
parts: The sons of Jehoiakim were Jeconiah his son and Zedekiah his son.

verses.text: The sons of Jeconiah were Assir, Shealtiel his son, and Malchiram, Pedaiah, Shenazzar, Jecamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.
parts: The sons of Jeconiah were Assir, Shealtiel his son, and Malchiram, Pedaiah, Shenazzar, Jecamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.

verses.text: and Malchiram, Pedaiah, Shenazzar, Jecamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.
parts: and Malchiram, Pedaiah, Shenazzar, Jecamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.

verses.text: The sons of Pedaiah were Zerubbabel and Shimei.
parts: The sons of Pedaiah were Zerubbabel and Shimei.

verses.text: and Hashubah, Ohel, Berechiah, Hasadiah, and Jushab-Hesed, five in all.
parts: and Hashubah, Ohel, Berechiah, Hasadiah, and Jushab-Hesed, five in all.

verses.text: The sons of Hananiah were Pelatiah and Jeshaiah, the sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, and the sons of Shechaniah.
parts: The sons of Hananiah were Pelatiah and Jeshaiah, the sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, and the sons of Shechaniah.

verses.text: The son of Shechaniah was Shemaiah.
parts: The son of Shechaniah was Shemaiah.

verses.text: The sons of Neariah were Elioenai, Hezekiah, and Azrikam, three in all.
parts: The sons of Neariah were Elioenai, Hezekiah, and Azrikam, three in all.

verses.text: The sons of Elioenai were Hodaviah, Eliashib, Pelaiah, Akkub, Johanan, Delaiah, and Anani, seven in all.
parts: The sons of Elioenai were Hodaviah, Eliashib, Pelaiah, Akkub, Johanan, Delaiah, and Anani, seven in all.

verses.text: The sons of Judah were Perez, Hezron, Carmi, Hur, and Shobal. And Reaiah the son of Shobal begot Jahath, and Jahath begot Ahumai and Lahad.
parts: The sons of Judah were Perez, Hezron, Carmi, Hur, and Shobal.
And Reaiah the son of Shobal begot Jahath, and Jahath begot Ahumai and Lahad.

verses.text: These were the sons of the father of Etam: Jezreel, Ishma, and Idbash; and the name of their sister was Hazelelponi;
parts: These were the sons of the father of Etam: Jezreel, Ishma, and Idbash; and the name of their sister was Hazelelponi;

verses.text: and Penuel was the father of Gedor, and Ezer was the father of Hushah.
parts: and Penuel was the father of Gedor, and Ezer was the father of Hushah.

verses.text: And Ashhur the father of Tekoa had two wives, Helah and Naarah.
parts: And Ashhur the father of Tekoa had two wives, Helah and Naarah.

verses.text: Naarah bore him Ahuzzam, Hepher, Temeni, and Haahashtari.
parts: Naarah bore him Ahuzzam, Hepher, Temeni, and Haahashtari.

verses.text: The sons of Helah were Zereth, Zohar, and Ethnan.
parts: The sons of Helah were Zereth, Zohar, and Ethnan.

verses.text: Koz begot Anub, Zobebah, and the families of Aharhel the son of Harum.
parts: Koz begot Anub, Zobebah, and the families of Aharhel the son of Harum.

verses.text: Now Jabez was more honorable than his brothers, and his mother called his name Jabez, saying, “Because I bore him in pain.”
parts: Now Jabez was more honorable than his brothers, and his mother called his name Jabez, saying, “Because I bore him in pain.”

verses.text: And Jabez called on the God of Israel, saying, “Oh, that You would bless me indeed, and enlarge my territory, that Your hand would be with me, and make known that You will not humble me.” Then God made it all happen as he requested.
parts: And Jabez called on the God of Israel, saying, “Oh, that You would bless me indeed, and enlarge my territory, that Your hand would be with me, and make known that You will not humble me.” Then God made it all happen as he requested.

verses.text: Chelub the brother of Shuhah begot Mehir, who was the father of Eshton.
parts: Chelub the brother of Shuhah begot Mehir, who was the father of Eshton.

verses.text: And Eshton begot Beth-Rapha, Paseah, and Tehinnah the father of Ir-Nahash.
parts: And Eshton begot Beth-Rapha, Paseah, and Tehinnah the father of Ir-Nahash.

verses.text: The sons of Kenaz were Othniel and Seraiah.
parts: The sons of Kenaz were Othniel and Seraiah.

verses.text: and Meonothai who begot Ophrah.
parts: and Meonothai who begot Ophrah.

verses.text: The sons of Caleb the son of Jephunneh were Iru, Elah, and Naam.
parts: The sons of Caleb the son of Jephunneh were Iru, Elah, and Naam.

verses.text: The sons of Jehalelel were Ziph, Ziphah, Tiria, and Asarel.
parts: The sons of Jehalelel were Ziph, Ziphah, Tiria, and Asarel.

verses.text: The sons of Ezrah were Jether, Mered, Epher, and Jalon.
parts: The sons of Ezrah were Jether, Mered, Epher, and Jalon.

verses.text: His wife Jehudijah bore Jered the father of Gedor, Heber the father of Sochoh, and Jekuthiel the father of Zanoah.
parts: His wife Jehudijah bore Jered the father of Gedor, Heber the father of Sochoh, and Jekuthiel the father of Zanoah.

verses.text: The sons of Hodiah's wife, the sister of Naham, were the fathers of Keilah the Garmite and of Eshtemoa the Maachathite.
parts: The sons of Hodiah's wife, the sister of Naham, were the fathers of Keilah the Garmite and of Eshtemoa the Maachathite.

verses.text: The sons of Shimon were Amnon, Rinnah, Ben-Hanan, and Tilon.
parts: The sons of Shimon were Amnon, Rinnah, Ben-Hanan, and Tilon.

verses.text: also Jokim, and the men of Chozeba and Joash and Saraph, who lived in Moab, and he turned them back.
parts: also Jokim, and the men of Chozeba and Joash and Saraph, who lived in Moab, and he turned them back.

verses.text: These were the potters living at Netaim and Gederah with the king, who prevailed in his kingdom and lived there.
parts: These were the potters living at Netaim and Gederah with the king, who prevailed in his kingdom and lived there.

verses.text: The sons of Simeon were Nemuel, Jamin, Jarib, Zerah, and Shaul, Shallum his son, Mibsam his son, and Mishma his son.

parts: The sons of Mishma were Hamuel his son, Zacchur his son, and Shimei his son.

verses.text: Shimei had sixteen sons and three daughters; but his brothers did not have many children, nor did any of their families multiply as much as the children of Judah.
parts: Shimei had sixteen sons and three daughters; but his brothers did not have many children, nor did any of their families multiply as much as the children of Judah.

verses.text: Bethuel, Hormah, Ziklag,
parts: Bethuel, Hormah, Ziklag,

verses.text: Beth-Marcaboth, Hazar Susim, Beth-Biri, and at Shaaraim.
parts: Beth-Marcaboth, Hazar Susim, Beth-Biri, and at Shaaraim.

parts: And their villages were Etam, Ain, Rimmon, Tochen, and Ashan, five cities,

verses.text: and all their villages were round about these cities as far as Baal.
parts: and all their villages were round about these cities as far as Baal.

verses.text: these mentioned by name were leaders in their families, and they increased abundantly in their fathers’ households.
parts: these mentioned by name were leaders in their families, and they increased abundantly in their fathers’ households.

verses.text: So they went to the entrance of Gedor, as far as the east side of the valley, to seek pasture for their flocks.
parts: So they went to the entrance of Gedor, as far as the east side of the valley, to seek pasture for their flocks.

verses.text: And they found rich, good pasture, and the land was broad, quiet, and peaceful.
parts: And they found rich, good pasture, and the land was broad, quiet, and peaceful.

verses.text: These recorded by name came in the days of Hezekiah king of Judah; and they attacked their tents and the Meunites who were found there, and utterly destroyed them, as it is to this day.
parts: These recorded by name came in the days of Hezekiah king of Judah; and they attacked their tents and the Meunites who were found there, and utterly destroyed them, as it is to this day.

verses.text: Now some of them, five hundred men of the sons of Simeon, went to Mount Seir, having as their captains Pelatiah, Neariah, Rephaiah, and Uzziel, the sons of Ishi.
parts: Now some of them, five hundred men of the sons of Simeon, went to Mount Seir, having as their captains Pelatiah, Neariah, Rephaiah, and Uzziel, the sons of Ishi.

verses.text: And they killed the remnants of the Amalekites, and dwell there to this day.
parts: And they killed the remnants of the Amalekites, and dwell there to this day.

verses.text: Now the sons of Reuben the firstborn of Israel.
parts: Now the sons of Reuben the firstborn of Israel.

verses.text: for Judah was able to prevail over his brothers, and from him came a ruler, although the blessing was Joseph's.
parts: for Judah was able to prevail over his brothers, and from him came a ruler, although the blessing was Joseph's.

verses.text: The sons of Reuben, the firstborn of Israel, were Hanoch, Pallu, Hezron, and Carmi.
parts: The sons of Reuben, the firstborn of Israel, were Hanoch, Pallu, Hezron, and Carmi.

verses.text: Micah his son, Reaiah his son, Baal his son,
parts: Micah his son, Reaiah his son, Baal his son,

verses.text: and Beerah his son, whom Tiglath-Pileser, king of Assyria, carried into captivity.
parts: and Beerah his son, whom Tiglath-Pileser, king of Assyria, carried into captivity.

verses.text: And his brethren by their families, when the genealogy of their generations was registered: the chief, Jeiel, and Zechariah,
parts: And his brethren by their families, when the genealogy of their generations was registered: the chief, Jeiel, and Zechariah,

verses.text: and Bela the son of Azaz, the son of Shema, the son of Joel, who dwelt in Aroer, as far as Nebo and Baal-Meon.

verses.text: And because their flocks were many in the land of Gilead, they settled eastward, as far as the entrance of the wilderness on this side of the River Euphrates.
parts: And because their flocks were many in the land of Gilead, they settled eastward, as far as the entrance of the wilderness on this side of the River Euphrates.

verses.text: Now in the days of Saul they made war with the sojourners, and those who dwelt in tents throughout the entire area east of Gilead fell by their hand.
parts: Now in the days of Saul they made war with the sojourners, and those who dwelt in tents throughout the entire area east of Gilead fell by their hand.

verses.text: The children of Gad dwelt next to them in the land of Bashan as far as Salcah: Joel was the chief, Shapham the next, then Jaanai and Shaphat in Bashan, and their brethren according to the house of their fathers: Michael, Meshullam, Sheba, Jorai, Jachan, Zia, and Eber, seven in all.
parts: The children of Gad dwelt next to them in the land of Bashan as far as Salcah: Joel was the chief, Shapham the next, then Jaanai and Shaphat in Bashan, and their brethren according to the house of their fathers: Michael, Meshullam, Sheba, Jorai, Jachan, Zia, and Eber, seven in all.

verses.text: These were the children of Abihail the son of Huri, the son of Jaroah, the son of Gilead, the son of Michael, the son of Jeshishai, the son of Jahdo, the son of Buz;

verses.text: Ahi the son of Abdiel, the son of Guni, was chief of their fathers’ house.
parts: Ahi the son of Abdiel, the son of Guni, was chief of their fathers’ house.

verses.text: And the Gadites dwelt in Gilead, in Bashan and in its villages, and in all the common lands of Sharon within their borders.
parts: And the Gadites dwelt in Gilead, in Bashan and in its villages, and in all the common lands of Sharon within their borders.

verses.text: All these were registered by genealogies in the days of Jotham king of Judah and in the days of Jeroboam king of Israel.
parts: All these were registered by genealogies in the days of Jotham king of Judah and in the days of Jeroboam king of Israel.

verses.text: The sons of Reuben, the Gadites, and half the tribe of Manasseh had forty-four thousand seven hundred sixty valiant men able to bear shield and sword, to shoot with the bow, and who were skillful in war.
parts: The sons of Reuben, the Gadites, and half the tribe of Manasseh had forty-four thousand seven hundred sixty valiant men able to bear shield and sword, to shoot with the bow, and who were skillful in war.

verses.text: They made war with the Hagrites, Jetur, Naphish, and Nodab.
parts: They made war with the Hagrites, Jetur, Naphish, and Nodab.

verses.text: And they prevailed against them, and the Hagrites and all their encampments were delivered into their hand; for they cried out to God in the battle, and He heeded them, for they hoped in Him.
parts: And they prevailed against them, and the Hagrites and all their encampments were delivered into their hand; for they cried out to God in the battle, and He heeded them, for they hoped in Him.

verses.text: Then they took away fifty thousand of their camels, two hundred fifty thousand of their sheep, and two thousand of their donkeys, also one hundred thousand of their men;
parts: Then they took away fifty thousand of their camels, two hundred fifty thousand of their sheep, and two thousand of their donkeys, also one hundred thousand of their men;

verses.text: for many fell dead, because the war was of God.
parts: for many fell dead, because the war was of God.

verses.text: And the half-tribe of Manasseh dwelt in the land from Bashan to Baal-Hermon, and Senir to Mount Hermon.
parts: And the half-tribe of Manasseh dwelt in the land from Bashan to Baal-Hermon, and Senir to Mount Hermon.

verses.text: These were the heads of the houses of their fathers: Epher, Ishi, Eliel, Azriel, Jeremiah, Hodaviah, and Jahdiel.
parts: These were the heads of the houses of their fathers: Epher, Ishi, Eliel, Azriel, Jeremiah, Hodaviah, and Jahdiel.

verses.text: But they were unfaithful to the God of their fathers and played the harlot after the gods of the peoples of the land, whom God had destroyed before them. So the God of Israel stirred up the spirit of Pul king of Assyria, that is, Tiglath-Pileser king of Assyria.
parts: But they were unfaithful to the God of their fathers and played the harlot after the gods of the peoples of the land, whom God had destroyed before them.
So the God of Israel stirred up the spirit of Pul king of Assyria, that is, Tiglath-Pileser king of Assyria.

verses.text: And from the tribe of Naphtali, Kedesh in Galilee with its common lands, Hammon with its common lands, and Kirjathaim with its common lands.
parts: And from the tribe of Naphtali, Kedesh in Galilee with its common lands, Hammon with its common lands, and Kirjathaim with its common lands.

verses.text: From the tribe of Zebulun, the rest of the children of Merari were given Rimmon with its common lands and Tabor with its common lands.
parts: From the tribe of Zebulun, the rest of the children of Merari were given Rimmon with its common lands and Tabor with its common lands.

verses.text: And on the other side of the Jordan, across from Jericho on the east side of the Jordan, they were given from the tribe of Reuben: Bezer in the wilderness with its common lands, Jahzah with its common lands,
parts: And on the other side of the Jordan, across from Jericho on the east side of the Jordan, they were given from the tribe of Reuben: Bezer in the wilderness with its common lands, Jahzah with its common lands,

verses.text: Kedemoth with its common lands, and Mephaath with its common lands.
parts: Kedemoth with its common lands, and Mephaath with its common lands.

verses.text: And from the tribe of Gad, Ramoth in Gilead with its common lands, Mahanaim with its common-lands,
parts: And from the tribe of Gad, Ramoth in Gilead with its common lands, Mahanaim with its common-lands,

verses.text: Heshbon with its common lands, and Jazer with its common lands.
parts: Heshbon with its common lands, and Jazer with its common lands.

verses.text: The sons of Issachar were Tola, Puah, Jashub, and Shimron, four in all. The sons of Tola were Uzzi, Rephaiah, Jeriel, Jahmai, Jibsam, and Shemuel, heads of the houses of their fathers.
parts: The sons of Issachar were Tola, Puah, Jashub, and Shimron, four in all.
The sons of Tola were Uzzi, Rephaiah, Jeriel, Jahmai, Jibsam, and Shemuel, heads of the houses of their fathers.

verses.text: The son of Uzzi was Izrahiah, and the sons of Izrahiah were Michael, Obadiah, Joel, and Ishiah.
parts: The son of Uzzi was Izrahiah, and the sons of Izrahiah were Michael, Obadiah, Joel, and Ishiah.

verses.text: And with them, by their generations, according to the houses of their fathers, were thirty-six thousand troops ready for war; for they had many wives and sons.
parts: And with them, by their generations, according to the houses of their fathers, were thirty-six thousand troops ready for war; for they had many wives and sons.

verses.text: Now their brethren among all the families of Issachar were mighty men of valor: listed by their genealogies, they were eighty-seven thousand in all.
parts: Now their brethren among all the families of Issachar were mighty men of valor: listed by their genealogies, they were eighty-seven thousand in all.

verses.text: The sons of Benjamin were Bela, Becher, and Jediael, three in all.
parts: The sons of Benjamin were Bela, Becher, and Jediael, three in all.

verses.text: The sons of Bela were Ezbon, Uzzi, Uzziel, Jerimoth, and Iri, five in all.
parts: The sons of Bela were Ezbon, Uzzi, Uzziel, Jerimoth, and Iri, five in all.

verses.text: The sons of Becher were Zemirah, Joash, Eliezer, Elioenai, Omri, Jerimoth, Abijah, Anathoth, and Alemeth.
parts: The sons of Becher were Zemirah, Joash, Eliezer, Elioenai, Omri, Jerimoth, Abijah, Anathoth, and Alemeth.

verses.text: As heads of the houses of their fathers—men of influence—they numbered twenty thousand two hundred, according to their generations.
parts: As heads of the houses of their fathers—men of influence—they numbered twenty thousand two hundred, according to their generations.

verses.text: The son of Jediael was Bilhan, and the sons of Bilhan were Jeush, Benjamin, Ehud, Chenaanah, Zethan, Tharshish, and Ahishahar.
parts: The son of Jediael was Bilhan, and the sons of Bilhan were Jeush, Benjamin, Ehud, Chenaanah, Zethan, Tharshish, and Ahishahar.

verses.text: All these sons of Jediael were heads of the houses of their fathers’ houses; there were seventeen thousand two hundred men, strong in strength, fit to go out for war and battle.
parts: All these sons of Jediael were heads of the houses of their fathers’ houses; there were seventeen thousand two hundred men, strong in strength, fit to go out for war and battle.

verses.text: Shuppim and Huppim were the sons of Ir.
parts: Shuppim and Huppim were the sons of Ir.

verses.text: The sons of Naphtali were Jahziel, Guni, Jezer, and Shallum, the sons of Bilhah.
parts: The sons of Naphtali were Jahziel, Guni, Jezer, and Shallum, the sons of Bilhah.

verses.text: The descendants of Manasseh: his Syrian concubine bore him Machir the father of Gilead, the father of Asriel.
parts: The descendants of Manasseh: his Syrian concubine bore him Machir the father of Gilead, the father of Asriel.

verses.text: Machir took as his wife the sister of Huppim and Shuppim, whose name was Maachah.
parts: Machir took as his wife the sister of Huppim and Shuppim, whose name was Maachah.

verses.text: Maachah the wife of Machir bore a son, and she called his name Peresh.
parts: Maachah the wife of Machir bore a son, and she called his name Peresh.

verses.text: The son of Ulam was Bedan.
parts: The son of Ulam was Bedan.

verses.text: His sister Hammoleketh bore Ishhod, Abiezer, and Mahlah.
parts: His sister Hammoleketh bore Ishhod, Abiezer, and Mahlah.

verses.text: The sons of Shemida were Ahian, Shechem, Likhi, and Aniam.
parts: The sons of Shemida were Ahian, Shechem, Likhi, and Aniam.

verses.text: The sons of Ephraim were Shuthelah, Bered his son, Tahath his son, Eladah his son, Tahath his son, Zabad his son, Shuthelah his son, and Ezer and Elead.
parts: The sons of Ephraim were Shuthelah, Bered his son, Tahath his son, Eladah his son, Tahath his son,
Zabad his son, Shuthelah his son, and Ezer and Elead.

verses.text: Zabad his son, Shuthelah his son, and Ezer and Elead.
parts: Zabad his son, Shuthelah his son, and Ezer and Elead.

verses.text: Then Ephraim their father mourned many days, and his brethren came to comfort him.
parts: Then Ephraim their father mourned many days, and his brethren came to comfort him.

verses.text: And when he went in to his wife, she conceived and bore a son; and he called his name Beriah, because tragedy had come upon his house.
parts: And when he went in to his wife, she conceived and bore a son; and he called his name Beriah, because tragedy had come upon his house.

verses.text: And for those who remained, he also built Lower and Upper Beth-Horon.
parts: And for those who remained, he also built Lower and Upper Beth-Horon.

verses.text: and Rephah was his son, as well as Resheph, and Telah his son, Tahan his son,
parts: and Rephah was his son, as well as Resheph, and Telah his son, Tahan his son,

verses.text: Laadan his son, Ammihud his son, Elishama his son,
parts: Laadan his son, Ammihud his son, Elishama his son,

verses.text: Nun his son, and Joshua his son.
parts: Nun his son, and Joshua his son.

verses.text: Now their possessions and dwelling places were Bethel and its towns: to the east Naaran, to the west Gezer and its towns, and Shechem and its towns, as far as Ayyah and its towns;
parts: Now their possessions and dwelling places were Bethel and its towns: to the east Naaran, to the west Gezer and its towns, and Shechem and its towns, as far as Ayyah and its towns;

verses.text: and by the borders of the children of Manasseh were Beth-Shean and its towns, Taanach and its towns, Megiddo and its towns, Dor and its towns.
parts: and by the borders of the children of Manasseh were Beth-Shean and its towns, Taanach and its towns, Megiddo and its towns, Dor and its towns.

verses.text: The sons of Asher were Imnah, Ishvah, Ishvi, Beriah, and their sister Serah.
parts: The sons of Asher were Imnah, Ishvah, Ishvi, Beriah, and their sister Serah.

verses.text: The sons of Beriah were Heber and Malchiel, who was the father of Birzaith.
parts: The sons of Beriah were Heber and Malchiel, who was the father of Birzaith.

verses.text: And Heber begot Japhlet, Shomer, Hotham, and their sister Shua.
parts: And Heber begot Japhlet, Shomer, Hotham, and their sister Shua.

verses.text: The sons of Japhlet were Pasach, Bimhal, and Ashvath—these were the children of Japhlet.
parts: The sons of Japhlet were Pasach, Bimhal, and Ashvath—these were the children of Japhlet.

verses.text: The sons of Shemer were Ahi, Rohgah, Jehubbah, and Aram.
parts: The sons of Shemer were Ahi, Rohgah, Jehubbah, and Aram.

verses.text: And the sons of his brother Helem were Zophah, Imna, Shelesh, and Amal.
parts: And the sons of his brother Helem were Zophah, Imna, Shelesh, and Amal.

verses.text: The sons of Zophah were Suah, Harnepher, Shual, Beri, Imrah,
parts: The sons of Zophah were Suah, Harnepher, Shual, Beri, Imrah,

verses.text: Bezer, Hod, Shamma, Shilshah, Jithran, and Beera.
parts: Bezer, Hod, Shamma, Shilshah, Jithran, and Beera.

verses.text: The sons of Jether were Jephunneh, Pispah, and Ara.
parts: The sons of Jether were Jephunneh, Pispah, and Ara.

verses.text: The sons of Ulla were Arah, Haniel, and Rizia.
parts: The sons of Ulla were Arah, Haniel, and Rizia.

verses.text: All these were the children of Asher, heads of the households of their fathers’ houses, choice men, strong in strength and chief leaders.
parts: All these were the children of Asher, heads of the households of their fathers’ houses, choice men, strong in strength and chief leaders.

verses.text: Now Benjamin begot Bela his firstborn, Ashbel the second, Aharah the third, Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.
parts: Now Benjamin begot Bela his firstborn, Ashbel the second, Aharah the third,
Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.

verses.text: The sons of Bela were Addar, Gera, Abihud,
parts: The sons of Bela were Addar, Gera, Abihud,

verses.text: Abishua, Naaman, Ahoah,
parts: Abishua, Naaman, Ahoah,

verses.text: Gera, Shephuphan, and Huram.
parts: Gera, Shephuphan, and Huram.

verses.text: These are the sons of Ehud, who were the heads of the houses of their fathers, of the inhabitants of Geba—they who forced them to move to Manahath:
parts: These are the sons of Ehud, who were the heads of the houses of their fathers, of the inhabitants of Geba—they who forced them to move to Manahath:

verses.text: Naaman, Ahijah, and Gera, who forced them to move.
parts: Naaman, Ahijah, and Gera, who forced them to move.

verses.text: Also Shaharaim had children in the country of Moab, after he had sent away Hushim and Baara his wives.
parts: Also Shaharaim had children in the country of Moab, after he had sent away Hushim and Baara his wives.

verses.text: By Hodesh his wife he begot Jobab, Zibia, Mesha, Malcam,
parts: By Hodesh his wife he begot Jobab, Zibia, Mesha, Malcam,

verses.text: Jeuz, Sachiah, and Mirmah.
parts: Jeuz, Sachiah, and Mirmah.

verses.text: And by Hushim he begot Abitub and Elpaal.
parts: And by Hushim he begot Abitub and Elpaal.

verses.text: The sons of Elpaal were Eber, Misham, and Shemed, who built Ono and Lod with its towns;
parts: The sons of Elpaal were Eber, Misham, and Shemed, who built Ono and Lod with its towns;

verses.text: and Beriah and Shema, who were heads of their fathers’ houses of the inhabitants of Aijalon, who drove out the inhabitants of Gath.
parts: and Beriah and Shema, who were heads of their fathers’ houses of the inhabitants of Aijalon, who drove out the inhabitants of Gath.

verses.text: Ahio, Shashak, Jeremoth,
parts: Ahio, Shashak, Jeremoth,

verses.text: Zebadiah, Arad, Eder,
parts: Zebadiah, Arad, Eder,

verses.text: Michael, Ispah, and Joha were the sons of Beriah.
parts: Michael, Ispah, and Joha were the sons of Beriah.

verses.text: Zebadiah, Meshullam, Hizki, Heber,
parts: Zebadiah, Meshullam, Hizki, Heber,

verses.text: Ishmerai, Jizliah, and Jobab were the sons of Elpaal.
parts: Ishmerai, Jizliah, and Jobab were the sons of Elpaal.

verses.text: Jakim, Zichri, Zabdi,
parts: Jakim, Zichri, Zabdi,

verses.text: Elienai, Zillethai, Eliel,
parts: Elienai, Zillethai, Eliel,

verses.text: Adaiah, Beraiah, and Shimrath were the sons of Shimei.
parts: Adaiah, Beraiah, and Shimrath were the sons of Shimei.

verses.text: Ishpan, Eber, Eliel,
parts: Ishpan, Eber, Eliel,

verses.text: Abdon, Zichri, Hanan,
parts: Abdon, Zichri, Hanan,

verses.text: Hananiah, Elam, Antothijah,
parts: Hananiah, Elam, Antothijah,

verses.text: Iphdeiah, and Penuel were the sons of Shashak.
parts: Iphdeiah, and Penuel were the sons of Shashak.

verses.text: Shamsherai, Shehariah, Athaliah,
parts: Shamsherai, Shehariah, Athaliah,

verses.text: Jaareshiah, Elijah, and Zichri were the sons of Jeroham.
parts: Jaareshiah, Elijah, and Zichri were the sons of Jeroham.

verses.text: These were heads of the houses of their fathers by their generations, chief men.
parts: These were heads of the houses of their fathers by their generations, chief men.

verses.text: Now the father of Gibeon, whose wife's name was Maacah, dwelt at Gibeon.
parts: Now the father of Gibeon, whose wife's name was Maacah, dwelt at Gibeon.

verses.text: And his firstborn son was Abdon, then Zur, Kish, Baal, Nadab,
parts: And his firstborn son was Abdon, then Zur, Kish, Baal, Nadab,

verses.text: Gedor, Ahio, Zecher,
parts: Gedor, Ahio, Zecher,

verses.text: and Mikloth, who begot Shimeah.
parts: and Mikloth, who begot Shimeah.

verses.text: Ner begot Kish, Kish begot Saul, and Saul begot Jonathan, Malchishua, Abinadab, and Esh-Baal.
parts: Ner begot Kish, Kish begot Saul, and Saul begot Jonathan, Malchishua, Abinadab, and Esh-Baal.

verses.text: The son of Jonathan was Merib-Baal, and Merib-Baal begot Micah.
parts: The son of Jonathan was Merib-Baal, and Merib-Baal begot Micah.

verses.text: The sons of Micah were Pithon, Melech, Tarea, and Ahaz.
parts: The sons of Micah were Pithon, Melech, Tarea, and Ahaz.

verses.text: And Ahaz begot Jehoaddah; Jehoaddah begot Alemeth, Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begot Moza.
parts: And Ahaz begot Jehoaddah; Jehoaddah begot Alemeth, Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begot Moza.

verses.text: Moza begot Binea, Raphah his son, Eleasah his son, and Azel his son.
parts: Moza begot Binea, Raphah his son, Eleasah his son, and Azel his son.

verses.text: Azel had six sons whose names were these: Azrikam, Bocheru, Ishmael, Sheariah, Obadiah, and Hanan.
parts: Azel had six sons whose names were these: Azrikam, Bocheru, Ishmael, Sheariah, Obadiah, and Hanan.

verses.text: And the sons of Eshek his brother were Ulam his firstborn, Jeush the second, and Eliphelet the third.
parts: And the sons of Eshek his brother were Ulam his firstborn, Jeush the second, and Eliphelet the third.

verses.text: The sons of Ulam were mighty men of valor, archers.
parts: The sons of Ulam were mighty men of valor, archers.

verses.text: And the census was of all Israel, those who had been inscribed in the Book of the Kings of Israel and Judah, along with those banished to Babylon in their lawlessness; and those who dwelled formerly with their possessions in the cities of Israel, and the priests, the Levites, and those to whom permission had been given.
parts: And the census was of all Israel, those who had been inscribed in the Book of the Kings of Israel and Judah, along with those banished to Babylon in their lawlessness;
and those who dwelled formerly with their possessions in the cities of Israel, and the priests, the Levites, and those to whom permission had been given.

verses.text: Then some of the children of Judah dwelt in Jerusalem, along with some of the children of Benjamin, and the children of Ephraim and Manasseh: Uthai the son of Ammihud, the son of Omri, the son of Imri, the son of Bani, of the descendants of Perez, the son of Judah.
parts: Then some of the children of Judah dwelt in Jerusalem, along with some of the children of Benjamin, and the children of Ephraim and Manasseh: Uthai the son of Ammihud, the son of Omri, the son of Imri, the son of Bani, of the descendants of Perez, the son of Judah.

verses.text: Uthai the son of Ammihud, the son of Omri, the son of Imri, the son of Bani, of the descendants of Perez, the son of Judah.
parts: Uthai the son of Ammihud, the son of Omri, the son of Imri, the son of Bani, of the descendants of Perez, the son of Judah.

verses.text: Of the Shilonites: Asaiah the firstborn and his sons.
parts: Of the Shilonites: Asaiah the firstborn and his sons.

verses.text: Of the sons of Zerah: Jeuel, and their brethren, six hundred ninety.
parts: Of the sons of Zerah: Jeuel, and their brethren, six hundred ninety.

verses.text: Of the sons of Benjamin: Sallu the son of Meshullam, the son of Hodaviah, the son of Hassenuah;
parts: Of the sons of Benjamin: Sallu the son of Meshullam, the son of Hodaviah, the son of Hassenuah;

verses.text: Ibneiah the son of Jeroham; Elah the son of Uzzi, the son of Michri; Meshullam the son of Shephatiah, the son of Reuel, the son of Ibnijah;
parts: Ibneiah the son of Jeroham; Elah the son of Uzzi, the son of Michri; Meshullam the son of Shephatiah, the son of Reuel, the son of Ibnijah;

verses.text: and their brethren, according to their generations, nine hundred fifty-six.
parts: and their brethren, according to their generations, nine hundred fifty-six.

verses.text: Of the priests, there were Jedaiah, Jehoiarib, and Jachin; Azariah the son of Hilkiah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Zadok, the son of Meraioth, the son of Ahitub, the officer over the house of God; Adaiah the son of Jeroham, the son of Pashur, the son of Malchijah; Maasai the son of Adiel, the son of Jahzerah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Meshillemith, the son of Immer; and their brethren, heads of the houses of their fathers, one thousand seven hundred sixty.
parts: Of the priests, there were Jedaiah, Jehoiarib, and Jachin; Azariah the son of Hilkiah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Zadok, the son of Meraioth, the son of Ahitub, the officer over the house of God; Adaiah the son of Jeroham, the son of Pashur, the son of Malchijah; Maasai the son of Adiel, the son of Jahzerah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Meshillemith, the son of Immer; and their brethren, heads of the houses of their fathers, one thousand seven hundred sixty.

verses.text: Azariah the son of Hilkiah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Zadok, the son of Meraioth, the son of Ahitub, the officer over the house of God;
parts: Azariah the son of Hilkiah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Zadok, the son of Meraioth, the son of Ahitub, the officer over the house of God;

verses.text: Adaiah the son of Jeroham, the son of Pashur, the son of Malchijah; Maasai the son of Adiel, the son of Jahzerah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Meshillemith, the son of Immer;
parts: Adaiah the son of Jeroham, the son of Pashur, the son of Malchijah; Maasai the son of Adiel, the son of Jahzerah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Meshillemith, the son of Immer;

verses.text: and their brethren, heads of the houses of their fathers, one thousand seven hundred sixty.
parts: and their brethren, heads of the houses of their fathers, one thousand seven hundred sixty.

verses.text: Of the Levites: Shemaiah the son of Hasshub, the son of Azrikam, the son of Hashabiah, of the sons of Merari; Bakbakkar, Heresh, Galal, and Mattaniah the son of Micah, the son of Zichri, the son of Asaph; Obadiah the son of Shemaiah, the son of Galal, the son of Jeduthun; and Berechiah the son of Asa, the son of Elkanah, who lived in the villages of the Netophathites.
parts: Of the Levites: Shemaiah the son of Hasshub, the son of Azrikam, the son of Hashabiah, of the sons of Merari; Bakbakkar, Heresh, Galal, and Mattaniah the son of Micah, the son of Zichri, the son of Asaph; Obadiah the son of Shemaiah, the son of Galal, the son of Jeduthun; and Berechiah the son of Asa, the son of Elkanah, who lived in the villages of the Netophathites.

verses.text: Bakbakkar, Heresh, Galal, and Mattaniah the son of Micah, the son of Zichri, the son of Asaph;
parts: Bakbakkar, Heresh, Galal, and Mattaniah the son of Micah, the son of Zichri, the son of Asaph;

verses.text: Obadiah the son of Shemaiah, the son of Galal, the son of Jeduthun; and Berechiah the son of Asa, the son of Elkanah, who lived in the villages of the Netophathites.
parts: Obadiah the son of Shemaiah, the son of Galal, the son of Jeduthun; and Berechiah the son of Asa, the son of Elkanah, who lived in the villages of the Netophathites.

verses.text: The gatekeepers were Shallum, Akkub, Talmon, Ahiman, and their brethren.
parts: The gatekeepers were Shallum, Akkub, Talmon, Ahiman, and their brethren.

verses.text: Until then they had been gatekeepers for the camps of the children of Levi at the King's Gate on the east.
parts: Until then they had been gatekeepers for the camps of the children of Levi at the King's Gate on the east.

verses.text: Shallum the son of Kore, the son of Ebiasaph, the son of Korah, and his brethren from his father's house, the Korahites, were in charge of the work of the service, gatekeepers of the tabernacle.
parts: Shallum the son of Kore, the son of Ebiasaph, the son of Korah, and his brethren from his father's house, the Korahites, were in charge of the work of the service, gatekeepers of the tabernacle.

verses.text: And Phinehas the son of Eleazar had been the officer over them in time past, and these were with him.
parts: And Phinehas the son of Eleazar had been the officer over them in time past, and these were with him.

verses.text: Zechariah the son of Meshelemiah was keeper of the door of the tabernacle of the testimony.
parts: Zechariah the son of Meshelemiah was keeper of the door of the tabernacle of the testimony.

verses.text: All those chosen as gatekeepers were two hundred twelve, and in their villages they were recorded by their genealogy.
parts: All those chosen as gatekeepers were two hundred twelve, and in their villages they were recorded by their genealogy.

verses.text: So they and their sons were to guard the gates of the house of the Lord, the house of the tabernacle.
parts: So they and their sons were to guard the gates of the house of the Lord, the house of the tabernacle.

verses.text: The gatekeepers were assigned to the four directions: the east, west, north, and south.
parts: The gatekeepers were assigned to the four directions: the east, west, north, and south.

verses.text: And their brethren in their villages had to come with them from time to time for seven days.
parts: And their brethren in their villages had to come with them from time to time for seven days.

verses.text: For in this trusted office were four chief gatekeepers; they were Levites.
parts: For in this trusted office were four chief gatekeepers; they were Levites.

verses.text: And they remained round about the house of God, for they had charge over the keys to unlock the doors of the temple every morning.
parts: And they remained round about the house of God, for they had charge over the keys to unlock the doors of the temple every morning.

verses.text: Now some of them were in charge of the serving vessels, for they brought them in and took them out by count.
parts: Now some of them were in charge of the serving vessels, for they brought them in and took them out by count.

verses.text: Some of them were appointed over the furnishings and over all the implements of the sanctuary, and over the fine flour and the wine and the oil and the incense and the spices.
parts: Some of them were appointed over the furnishings and over all the implements of the sanctuary, and over the fine flour and the wine and the oil and the incense and the spices.

verses.text: And some of the sons of the priests made the ointment of the spices.
parts: And some of the sons of the priests made the ointment of the spices.

verses.text: Mattithiah of the Levites, the firstborn of Shallum the Korahite, was entrusted over the items of the sacrificial offering from the chief priest's frying pan.
parts: Mattithiah of the Levites, the firstborn of Shallum the Korahite, was entrusted over the items of the sacrificial offering from the chief priest's frying pan.

verses.text: And Banaias the Kohathite out of their brethren was in charge of preparing the showbread for every Sabbath.
parts: And Banaias the Kohathite out of their brethren was in charge of preparing the showbread for every Sabbath.

verses.text: These are the singers, heads of the houses of the fathers of the Levites, who were assigned daily, freed from other duties, for they were employed in that work day and night.
parts: These are the singers, heads of the houses of the fathers of the Levites, who were assigned daily, freed from other duties, for they were employed in that work day and night.

verses.text: These heads of the houses of the fathers of the Levites were heads throughout their generations.
parts: These heads of the houses of the fathers of the Levites were heads throughout their generations.

verses.text: Jeiel the father of Gibeon, whose wife's name was Maacah, dwelt at Gibeon.
parts: Jeiel the father of Gibeon, whose wife's name was Maacah, dwelt at Gibeon.

verses.text: His firstborn son was Abdon, then Zur, Kish, Baal, Ner, Nadab,
parts: His firstborn son was Abdon, then Zur, Kish, Baal, Ner, Nadab,

verses.text: Gedor, Ahio, Zechariah, and Mikloth.
parts: Gedor, Ahio, Zechariah, and Mikloth.

verses.text: And Mikloth begot Shimeam.
parts: And Mikloth begot Shimeam.

verses.text: Ner begot Kish, Kish begot Saul, and Saul begot Jonathan, Malchishua, Abinadab, and Esh-Baal.
parts: Ner begot Kish, Kish begot Saul, and Saul begot Jonathan, Malchishua, Abinadab, and Esh-Baal.

verses.text: The son of Jonathan was Merib-Baal, and Merib-Baal begot Micah.
parts: The son of Jonathan was Merib-Baal, and Merib-Baal begot Micah.

verses.text: The sons of Micah were Pithon, Melech, Tahrea, and Ahaz.
parts: The sons of Micah were Pithon, Melech, Tahrea, and Ahaz.

verses.text: And Ahaz begot Jarah; Jarah begot Alemeth, Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begot Moza;
parts: And Ahaz begot Jarah; Jarah begot Alemeth, Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begot Moza;

verses.text: Moza begot Binea, Rephaiah his son, Eleasah his son, and Azel his son.
parts: Moza begot Binea, Rephaiah his son, Eleasah his son, and Azel his son.

verses.text: And Azel had six sons, whose names were Azrikam, Bocheru, Ishmael, Sheariah, Obadiah, and Hanan; these were the sons of Azel.
parts: And Azel had six sons, whose names were Azrikam, Bocheru, Ishmael, Sheariah, Obadiah, and Hanan; these were the sons of Azel.

verses.text: Now the Philistines fought against Israel; and the men of Israel fled from the Philistines and fell slain on Mount Gilboa. Then the Philistines followed hard after Saul and his sons.
parts: Now the Philistines fought against Israel; and the men of Israel fled from the Philistines and fell slain on Mount Gilboa.
Then the Philistines followed hard after Saul and his sons.

verses.text: The battle became fierce against Saul, and he was wounded by the archers who struck him.
parts: The battle became fierce against Saul, and he was wounded by the archers who struck him.

verses.text: Then Saul said to his armor-bearer, “Draw your sword and pierce me through with it, lest these uncircumcised men come and dishonor me.” But his armor-bearer would not, for he was greatly afraid.
parts: Then Saul said to his armor-bearer, “Draw your sword and pierce me through with it, lest these uncircumcised men come and dishonor me.” But his armor-bearer would not, for he was greatly afraid.

verses.text: And when his armor-bearer saw Saul was dead, he also fell on his sword and died.
parts: And when his armor-bearer saw Saul was dead, he also fell on his sword and died.

verses.text: So Saul and his three sons died, and all his house died together.
parts: So Saul and his three sons died, and all his house died together.

verses.text: And when all the men of Israel who were in the valley saw that they had fled, that Saul and his sons were dead, and that they left their cities fleeing, then the Philistines came and dwelt in them.
parts: And when all the men of Israel who were in the valley saw that they had fled, that Saul and his sons were dead, and that they left their cities fleeing, then the Philistines came and dwelt in them.

verses.text: So it happened the next day, when the Philistines came to strip the slain, they found Saul and his sons dead on Mount Gilboa.
parts: So it happened the next day, when the Philistines came to strip the slain, they found Saul and his sons dead on Mount Gilboa.

verses.text: They stripped him and took his head and his armor, and sent word throughout the land of the Philistines to proclaim the news in the temple of their idols and among the people.
parts: They stripped him and took his head and his armor, and sent word throughout the land of the Philistines to proclaim the news in the temple of their idols and among the people.

verses.text: Then they put his armor in the temple of their gods and fastened his head to the temple of Dagon.
parts: Then they put his armor in the temple of their gods and fastened his head to the temple of Dagon.

verses.text: And when all of Jabesh Gilead heard what the Philistines did to Saul,
parts: And when all of Jabesh Gilead heard what the Philistines did to Saul,

verses.text: all the valiant men arose from Gilead and took the body of Saul and the bodies of his sons back with them to Jabesh.
parts: all the valiant men arose from Gilead and took the body of Saul and the bodies of his sons back with them to Jabesh.

verses.text: So Saul died for his lawlessness which he committed against the Lord, according to the Word of the Lord, because he did not keep it, and because Saul sought counsel of a wizard and Samuel the prophet answered him; so He slew him and turned the kingdom over to David the son of Jesse.
parts: So Saul died for his lawlessness which he committed against the Lord, according to the Word of the Lord, because he did not keep it, and because Saul sought counsel of a wizard and Samuel the prophet answered him; so He slew him and turned the kingdom over to David the son of Jesse.

verses.text: Then all Israel came to David at Hebron, saying, “Indeed, we are your bone and your flesh. Also, in time past, even when Saul was king, it was you who led Israel in and out.
parts: Then all Israel came to David at Hebron, saying, “Indeed, we are your bone and your flesh.
Also, in time past, even when Saul was king, it was you who led Israel in and out.

verses.text: Therefore all the elders of Israel came to the king at Hebron, and David made a covenant with them at Hebron before the Lord.
parts: Therefore all the elders of Israel came to the king at Hebron, and David made a covenant with them at Hebron before the Lord.

verses.text: And the king and all Israel went to Jerusalem—this is Jebu—and there the Jebusites were inhabiting the land. And the people inhabiting Jebu said to David, “You shall not enter here!” But he seized the stronghold of Mount Zion, which is the City of David.
parts: And the king and all Israel went to Jerusalem—this is Jebu—and there the Jebusites were inhabiting the land.
And the people inhabiting Jebu said to David, “You shall not enter here!” But he seized the stronghold of Mount Zion, which is the City of David.

verses.text: And the people inhabiting Jebu said to David, “You shall not enter here!” But he seized the stronghold of Mount Zion, which is the City of David.
parts: And the people inhabiting Jebu said to David, “You shall not enter here!” But he seized the stronghold of Mount Zion, which is the City of David.

verses.text: And David said, “Whoever first strikes the Jebusites shall be chief and captain.” And Joab, the son of Zeruiah, went up first and became chief.
parts: And David said, “Whoever first strikes the Jebusites shall be chief and captain.” And Joab, the son of Zeruiah, went up first and became chief.

verses.text: Then David dwelt in the stronghold; thereafter he called it the City of David.
parts: Then David dwelt in the stronghold; thereafter he called it the City of David.

verses.text: And he waged war and took the city; around it he fortified the city.
parts: And he waged war and took the city; around it he fortified the city.

verses.text: So David grew ever stronger, and the Lord Almighty was with him.
parts: So David grew ever stronger, and the Lord Almighty was with him.

verses.text: Now these were the heads of the mighty men whom David had with him, who strengthened themselves in his kingdom, with all Israel, to make him king, according to the word of the Lord regarding Israel.
parts: Now these were the heads of the mighty men whom David had with him, who strengthened themselves in his kingdom, with all Israel, to make him king, according to the word of the Lord regarding Israel.

verses.text: And this is the number of the mighty men whom David had: Jashobeam the son of a Hachmonite, chief of the captains; he lifted up his spear against three hundred and killed them at one time.
parts: And this is the number of the mighty men whom David had: Jashobeam the son of a Hachmonite, chief of the captains; he lifted up his spear against three hundred and killed them at one time.

verses.text: After him was Eleazar the son of Dodo, the Ahohite, who was one of the three mighty men.
parts: After him was Eleazar the son of Dodo, the Ahohite, who was one of the three mighty men.

verses.text: He was with David at Pasdammim, and the Philistines gathered there for battle, near a field full of barley.
parts: He was with David at Pasdammim, and the Philistines gathered there for battle, near a field full of barley.

verses.text: And he stood in the midst of the field and preserved it, and killed the Philistines.
parts: And he stood in the midst of the field and preserved it, and killed the Philistines.

verses.text: Now three of the thirty chief men went down to the rock towards David, to the cave of Adullam.
parts: Now three of the thirty chief men went down to the rock towards David, to the cave of Adullam.

verses.text: David was then in the stronghold, and the garrison of the Philistines was then in Bethlehem.
parts: David was then in the stronghold, and the garrison of the Philistines was then in Bethlehem.

verses.text: And David said with longing, “Oh, that someone would give me a drink of water from the well of Bethlehem, which is by the gate!”
parts: And David said with longing, “Oh, that someone would give me a drink of water from the well of Bethlehem, which is by the gate!”

verses.text: So the three broke through the camp of the Philistines, drew water from the well of Bethlehem by the gate, and took it and brought some to David.
parts: So the three broke through the camp of the Philistines, drew water from the well of Bethlehem by the gate, and took it and brought some to David.

verses.text: And he said, “God be merciful to me.
parts: And he said, “God be merciful to me.

verses.text: Abishai the brother of Joab was chief of another three.
parts: Abishai the brother of Joab was chief of another three.

verses.text: Of the three he was more favored than the other two men, and was chief over them.
parts: Of the three he was more favored than the other two men, and was chief over them.

verses.text: Benaiah was the son of Jehoiada, the son of a valiant man from Kabzeel, who had done many deeds.
parts: Benaiah was the son of Jehoiada, the son of a valiant man from Kabzeel, who had done many deeds.

verses.text: And he killed an Egyptian, a man of great height, five cubits tall.
parts: And he killed an Egyptian, a man of great height, five cubits tall.

verses.text: These things Benaiah the son of Jehoiada did, and won a name among three mighty men.
parts: These things Benaiah the son of Jehoiada did, and won a name among three mighty men.

verses.text: Indeed, he was honored more than this thirty, but he did not attain to the first three.
parts: Indeed, he was honored more than this thirty, but he did not attain to the first three.

verses.text: And the mighty warriors were Asahel the brother of Joab, Elhanan the son of Dodo of Bethlehem, Shammoth the Harorite, Helez the Pelonite, Ira the son of Ikkesh the Tekoite, Abiezer the Anathothite, Sibbechai the Hushathite, Ilai the Ahohite, Maharai the Netophathite, Heled the son of Baanah the Netophathite, Ithai the son of Ribai of Gibeah, of the sons of Benjamin, Benaiah the Pirathonite, Hurai of the brooks of Gaash, Abiel the Arbathite, Azmaveth the Baharumite, Eliahba the Shaalbonite, the sons of Hashem the Gizonite, Jonathan the son of Shageh the Hararite, Ahiam the son of Sacar the Hararite, Eliphal the son of Ur, Hepher the Mecherathite, Ahijah the Pelonite, Hezro the Carmelite, Naarai the son of Ezbai, Joel the brother of Nathan, Mibhar the son of Hagri, Zelek the Ammonite, Naharai the Berothite (the armor-bearer of Joab the son of Zeruiah), Ira the Ithrite, Gareb the Ithrite, Uriah the Hittite, Zabad the son of Ahlai, Adina the son of Shiza the Reubenite (a chief of the Reubenites) and thirty with him, Hanan the son of Maachah, Joshaphat the Mithnite, Uzzia the Ashterathite, Shama and Jeiel the sons of Hotham the Aroerite, Jediael the son of Shimri, and Joha his brother, the Tizite, Eliel the Mahavite, Jeribai and Joshaviah the sons of Elnaam, Ithmah the Moabite, Eliel, Obed, and Jaasiel the Mezobaite.

verses.text: being armed with bows for shooting arrows and using either the right hand or the left for slinging stones.

verses.text: The chief was Ahiezer, then Joash, the sons of Shemaah the Gibeathite; Jeziel and Pelet the sons of Azmaveth; Berachah and Jehu the Anathothite;

parts: and Joelah and Zebadiah, the sons of Jeroham of Gedor.

verses.text: Some Gadites joined David in the wilderness, strong, mighty men of war, men trained for battle, who could handle shield and spear, whose faces were like the faces of lions and who were as swift as gazelles on the mountains: Ezer the first, Obadiah the second, Eliab the third, Mishmannah the fourth, Jeremiah the fifth, Attai the sixth, Eliel the seventh, Johanan the eighth, Elzabad the ninth, Jeremiah the tenth, and Machbanai the eleventh.

verses.text: These are the ones who crossed the Jordan in the first month, when it had overflowed all its banks; and they put to flight all those in the valleys, to the east and to the west.
parts: These are the ones who crossed the Jordan in the first month, when it had overflowed all its banks; and they put to flight all those in the valleys, to the east and to the west.

verses.text: Then some of the sons of Benjamin and Judah came to aid David at the stronghold.
parts: Then some of the sons of Benjamin and Judah came to aid David at the stronghold.

verses.text: David went out and met them, and addressed them by saying, “If you have come peaceably to me to help me, my heart will be united with you; but if to betray me to my enemies, since there is no guile in my hands, may the God of our fathers observe and bring judgment.”

verses.text: And some from Manasseh defected to David when he was going with the Philistines to battle against Saul; but they did not help them, for the lords of the Philistines sent him away by agreement, saying, “He may defect to his master Saul and endanger our heads.” When he went to Ziklag, those of Manasseh who defected to him were Adnah, Jozabad, Jediael, Michael, Jozabad, Elihu, and Zillethai, captains of the thousands who were from Manasseh.
parts: And some from Manasseh defected to David when he was going with the Philistines to battle against Saul; but they did not help them, for the lords of the Philistines sent him away by agreement, saying, “He may defect to his master Saul and endanger our heads.” When he went to Ziklag, those of Manasseh who defected to him were Adnah, Jozabad, Jediael, Michael, Jozabad, Elihu, and Zillethai, captains of the thousands who were from Manasseh.

verses.text: And they helped David against the bands of raiders, for they were all mighty men of valor, and they were captains in the army.

verses.text: For at that time they came to David day by day to help him, until it was a great army, like the army of God.
parts: For at that time they came to David day by day to help him, until it was a great army, like the army of God.

verses.text: Now these were the numbers of the divisions that were equipped for war and that came to David at Hebron to turn the kingdom of Saul over to him, according to the word of the Lord: of the sons of Judah bearing shield and spear, six thousand eight hundred armed for war; of the sons of Simeon, mighty men of valor fit for war, seven thousand one hundred; of the sons of Levi, four thousand six hundred; Jehoiada, the leader of the Aaronites, and with him three thousand seven hundred; Zadok, a young man, a valiant warrior, and from his father's house, twenty-two captains; of the sons of Benjamin, relatives of Saul, three thousand—until then the greatest part of them had remained loyal to the house of Saul; of the sons of Ephraim, twenty thousand eight hundred mighty men of valor, noted men throughout the house of their fathers; of the half-tribe of Manasseh, eighteen thousand who were designated by name to come and make David king; of the sons of Issachar who had understanding of the times, to know what Israel ought to do, their chiefs were two hundred, and all their brethren were at their command; of Zebulun, there were fifty thousand who went out to battle, expert in war with all weapons of war, stouthearted men who could keep ranks; of Naphtali, one thousand captains, and with them thirty-seven thousand with shield and spear; of the Danites who could keep battle formation, twenty-eight thousand six hundred; of Asher, those who could go out to war, able to keep battle formation, forty thousand; of the Reubenites and the Gadites and the half-tribe of Manasseh, from the other side of the Jordan, one hundred twenty thousand armed for battle with every kind of weapon of war.
